attributes.name: Force
attributes.description: The raw, physical power and kinetic energy a character can exert. Tied to physical combat and feats of strength.

attributes.name: Essence
attributes.description: A character's inner vitality, endurance, and connection to the world's life force. Tied to health, stamina, and resilience against corruption.

attributes.name: Arcanum
attributes.description: Mental acuity, knowledge of the world's hidden truths, and the ability to channel the Song. Tied to spellcasting, psionics, and investigation.

attributes.name: Prowess
attributes.description: Agility, finesse, and the skill with which a character executes complex actions. Tied to stealth, ranged combat, and fine motor skills.

attributes.name: Resonance
attributes.description: A character's attunement to the world's harmonious Song. Represents purity, healing, and resistance to the Void.

attributes.name: Dissonance
attributes.description: A character's susceptibility to the Void and the forces of decay. Represents chaos, corruption, and the ability to wield raw, destructive power.

attributeGeneration.method: To be determined (TBD). Will likely use a point-buy system similar to Conflict Horizon's Pentagram Attributes to enforce balance.

uniqueMechanics.name: Resonance vs. Dissonance
uniqueMechanics.description: The core conflict of the setting. Actions and powers are influenced by the character's alignment with the world's Song (harmony) or Void (chaos/decay).

uniqueMechanics.name: Dynamic Attribute Points (DAPs)
uniqueMechanics.description: A system for attribute growth and milestones, suggesting a fluid character progression.

uniqueMechanics.name: Song and Void Influences
uniqueMechanics.description: Environmental and magical effects tied to the world's balance.

usfrNotes: The core mechanical loop is the Universal Core System. The character creation process focuses on the four core attributes (Force, Arcanum, Essence, Prowess) and the unique Resonance/Dissonance alignment. All six Universal Keys are mapped to these attributes, with Gnosis/Entropy representing the core alignment mechanic. The scope has been expanded to include detailed mechanics for Resonance, Dissonance, and the Song/Void influences.
